fields.title: Introduction to Photoshop
fields.content_description:
Welcome!

In this video, I will introduce you to Photoshop and let you know how to set up your canvas for painting.

fields.title: Be Sketchy!
fields.content_description:
Sketching!

In this video, I will introduce you to sketching and let you know how to go about it.

An image file to use as follow along has been provided to download for you.

fields.title: Color it Rough
fields.content_description:
Rough Color!

In this video, I will introduce you to colorinig and let you know how to lay down some rough colors for your painting.

If you want to know more about color, read the file content below.

Enjoy!

fields.title: How to Setup Photoshop
fields.content_description: Basic setup for digital painting in Photoshop

fields.title: Refined Painting
fields.content_description:
This class is about refining your painting.

It is more of "you can have my husband but please, don't mess with my man".

fields.title: Details & Effects
fields.content_description: This class explains in details how to add details and effects like blending options and stuff.

fields.title: Final Polish
fields.content_description: Add final polishes to your artwork and call it a day...or not!

fields.title: Texture It!
fields.content_description: Add life to your artwork by adding textures as opposed to airbrushed paintings that look...

fields.title: Parting Gift
fields.content_description: This is the overview of all we have been through in the classes that we've had.

fields.title: Introduction to Photography
fields.content_description: This is the introduction to architecture photography first class

fields.title: Lets' talk Form
fields.content_description: This class is about form. This is not the type of form you fill...don't mind me.

fields.title: Light it Up
fields.content_description: Yes! Light is very important in architecture photography...any type of photography infact.

fields.title: Impact Emotionally!
fields.content_description: In this class we talk about how to make your photographs evoke emotions in people, plants, animals, cups, spoons...anything.

fields.title: What a Building is Made Up Of
fields.content_description: In this class we talk about materials.

fields.title: Compose It!
fields.content_description: Be composited! Know angles, camera positions, one-third views, concepts and stuff

fields.title: Yes, Color!
fields.content_description: The most fanscinating topic ever...color. It is so vast than the human eye and mind can comprehend. Some animals see more colors than humans.

fields.title: Lets' Recap
fields.content_description:
Here is the summary of what we have discussed so far...

  • First thing
  • Second thing
  • Third thing
  • Fourth thing

fields.title: Extending Class Based Views
fields.content_description: This class will move you from the basic function based views to advanced class based views

fields.title: Using Mixins
fields.content_description: This class goes in depth on using mixins. They make life easier and code writing more comfortable.

fields.title: REST Easy!
fields.content_description: This class will be solely on using the Django Rest Frame to scaffold, authenticating with DRF and so on.

fields.title: Why Testing Matters
fields.content_description: This class gives insight as to why testing matters, how Django handles testing, how to test models, views etc.

fields.title: Planning for Failure
fields.content_description: There are people whose sole aim is to break into your system to do good...or to cause mayhem. Either way, prepare for them.

fields.title: Setting Up - Code Editors
fields.content_description: This is the beginning part of your Django journey. I will take you through how to set up your code editors be it VS Code, Sublime Text, Brackets or whatever you want to use.

fields.title: App or Project?
fields.content_description: Discerning the difference is the key. In this class you will understand the distinction between the two.

fields.title: Model It!
fields.content_description: Learn how Django models works. What CharFields, SlugField, TextField, FileField all means

fields.title: Blog App
fields.content_description: In this class, we build a blog app to show you the basic CRUD applications. CRUD means Create, Read, Update and Delete.

fields.title: Deploy It
fields.content_description: Make your app accessible anywhere in the world by deploying it. I will do the hand holding on how to go about this.
